src: 「我々が飼っている生後4か月のマウスはかつて糖尿病でしたが現在は糖尿病ではない、」と彼は付け加えました。
mt: "The mice we're raising are no longer diabetic," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: ノバスコシア州ハリファックスにあるダルハウジー大学医学部教授でカナダ糖尿病協会の臨床・科学部門の責任者を務めるエフード・ウル博士は、この研究はまだ初期段階にあるとして注意を促しました。
mt: Dr. Efrat Ullman, a professor at Dalhousie University's medical school in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and head of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Diabetes Association, cautioned that this research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: 他の専門家たちと同様に、彼は糖尿病を完治できるかどうかについては懐疑的であり、これらの調査結果はすでにI型糖尿病を患っている人々には何の関連性もないことを指摘しています。
mt: Like other experts, he is skeptical about whether the disease can be cured, and points out that these results have no relevance to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: スウェーデンアカデミーのノーベル文学委員会の常任幹事であるサラ・ダニウス氏は月曜日、スウェーデンの公共放送ラジオの番組の中で、同委員会が2016年のノーベル文学賞受賞についてボブ・ディラン氏と直接連絡を取れなかったため、同氏と連絡を取ることを諦めたことを公に発表しました。
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Literature Committee, announced publicly that the committee had given up trying to contact Bob Dylan directly about the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, because it had been unable to reach him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: ダニアスは「今は何もしていない。彼の親しい協力者に電話をかけたり、メールを送ったりしたが、非常に友好的な返事が返ってきた。今のところは、確かにそれで十分だ。」と語った。
mt: "He's doing nothing at the moment. I've called or emailed some of his close associates, and they've been very friendly. For now, that's enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: RingのCEOであるジェイミー・スミノフは以前に、玄関の呼び出し音がガレージにある自分店から聞こえなかったことから事業を始めたと述べました。
mt: Jamie Siminoff, CEO of Ring, previously stated that he started the company after hearing the doorbell ring from his garage, but not from his front door.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: 彼はWi-Fiで鳴るドアベルを作ったそうです。
mt: He made a doorbell that rings over Wi-Fi.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: シミノフ氏は、2013年にシャークタンクのエピソードに出演した後、番組委員会が資金提供を辞退した後に売上が急激に伸びたと述べています。
mt: 2013, after appearing on the Shark Tank episode, Siminovitch says the show's committee declined to provide funding, but his sales skyrocketed.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017年後半にシミノフ氏はテレビショッピング「QVC」に出演しました。
mt: 2017 saw Siminovitch appear on the television shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ringはまた、競合するセキュリティ企業であるADTとの訴訟で和解しました。
mt: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company ADT.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: 実験的なワクチンでエボラの死亡率が減るように見えますが、今までのところ、既存の感染症の治療に適しているとはっきり実証された薬剤はありません。
mt: Experimental vaccines appear to reduce Ebola's death rate, but no drug has yet been definitively proven to treat existing infections.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: 抗体カクテルの1つであるZMappは、当初はこの分野で有望視されていましたが、正式な研究では期待されたほどの死亡予防効果がないことが示されました。
mt: One of the antibody cocktails, ZMapp, was initially seen as promising in this field, but formal research showed it did not prevent deaths as expected.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM試験では、ZMappは対照薬として使用され、科学者たちはZMappを基準として、他の3つの治療法と比較しました。
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a placebo, and researchers compared the other three treatments to ZMapp as a standard.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: 米国体操連盟（USA Gymnastics）は、米国オリンピック委員会の書簡を支持し、選手全員のための安全な環境づくりを促進するためにオリンピックファミリーの絶対的な必要性を受け入れます。
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter from the U.S. Olympic Committee and accepts the absolute necessity of creating a safe environment for all athletes as part of the Olympic family.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: 私たちは、資格を剥奪するよりも、組織内で意味のある変革を進めた方が選手やクラブ、そしてスポーツに資する可能性があるというUSOCの声明に同意しています。
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that it is more likely to benefit athletes, clubs, and sports to make meaningful changes within the organization than to revoke its membership.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: 米国体操連盟は、ラリー・ナッサー氏の遺族が勇気を持って説明したような虐待がなぜ長期に渡って発覚しなかったかを明らかにするための第三者による調査に協力し、必要かつ適切な変化を受け入れる所存です。
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association will cooperate with an independent investigation to reveal why abuse by Larry Nassar's family was not revealed for so long, and will accept necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: 米国体操連盟とUSOCは同じ目標を掲げています。アスリートが安全かつ前向きに力を発揮できる環境で夢を追いかけられるように、スポーツとしての体操やその他のスポーツをできるだけ安全なものにすることです。
mt: The USOC and USA Gymnastics share the same goal: to create an environment where athletes can safely pursue their dreams, and to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 1960年代を通して、ブレジンスキーはジョン・F・ケネディの顧問を務め、その後リンドン・B・ジョンソン政権でも活躍しました。
mt: 1960s, Brezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy, and later worked in the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976 年の大統領選ではカーターの外交政策について助言し、1977 年から 1981 年まで国家安全保障顧問（NSA）を務め、ヘンリー・キッシンジャーの後を継ぎました。
mt: 1976 presidential campaign, Carter's foreign policy, and served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: NSAとしてカーターを補佐し、1978年のキャンプ・デイビッド合意、1970年代後半の米中関係の正常化、1979年のイラン人質事件につながったイラン革命、1979年のソビエトのアフガニスタン侵攻など、世界問題を外交的に処理した。
mt: He served as National Security Advisor to Carter, and helped negotiate the Camp David Accords, the normalization of U.S.-China relations in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: ライアン・ゴズリングとエマ・ストーンが出演したこの映画は、すべての主要部門でノミネートされました。
mt: This film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: ゴズリングとストーンはそれぞれ主演男優賞と女優賞にノミネートされました。
mt: Gosling and Stone were both nominated for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: 最優秀作品賞、監督賞、撮影賞、衣装デザイン賞、映画編集賞、作曲賞、美術賞、音響編集賞、録音賞、脚本賞などにノミネートされました。
mt: It was nominated for Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Art Direction, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing, and Best Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: 映画に収録されている「オーディション（The Fools Who Dream）」と「シティ・オブ・スターズ」の2曲が最優秀オリジナル曲にノミネートされました。ライオンズゲート・スタジオは、他のどのスタジオよりも多い26のノミネートを受けました。
mt: 2 songs from the film, "The Fools Who Dream" and "City of Stars," were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate Studios received more nominations than any other studio, with 26.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: 日曜深夜、ドナルド・トランプ米大統領は報道官経由で配信された声明において、米軍がシリアから撤退することを発表しました。
mt: On Sunday night, President Donald Trump of the United States announced via press secretary that the U.S. military would be withdrawing from Syria in a statement released.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: 本件は、トランプ大統領がトルコのレセップ・タイップ・エルドアン大統領と電話会談した後で発表されました。
mt: This was announced after President Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: トルコはまた、捉えられたISIS戦闘員の警備を引き継ぐことになり、声明によれば、欧州諸国は戦闘員の本国送還を拒否している。
mt: Turkey is also taking over the security of ISIS fighters captured, according to a statement, which says European countries are refusing to repatriate the fighters to their home countries.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: これは、少なくとも一部の恐竜が羽を持っていたことを確認するだけでなく、色や立体配置など、一般的には化石にはない詳細な点を伝えています。
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also details such as color and three-dimensional positioning, which are usually not preserved in fossils.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: .科学者によると、この動物の羽毛は外側が栗色で内側が暖色系の色でした。
mt: According to scientists, the animal's feathers were reddish-brown on the outside and warm-colored on the inside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: この発見はまた、鳥類の羽毛の進化について探るための手がかりとなるものでした。
mt: This discovery also provides a clue to the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: 恐竜の羽毛には羽軸と呼ばれる十分に発達した軸がないものの、他の羽毛の特徴である綿羽や小羽枝があることから、研究者らは羽軸はこうした他の特徴よりも後に起きた進化であった可能性が高いと推測しています。
mt: Researchers say the presence of well-developed rachises, the central shaft of a feather, in dinosaur feathers suggests that the rachis evolved after other features such as barbs and barbules.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: 羽毛の構造から、飛行の目的ではなく、体温調節や視覚的効果に使用されていたと推測されます。研究者らは、これが若い恐竜の尾であるにもかかわらず、標本は大人の羽毛を示しており、ヒヨコの羽毛ではないことを示唆しました。
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were used for temperature regulation and visual effects, rather than flight. Researchers say the specimen, despite being from a young dinosaur, shows adult feathers, not those of a chick.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 研究者らは、この標本が若い恐竜の尻尾であるにもかかわらず、ひなの羽毛ではなく大人の羽毛が生えていることを示唆している。
mt: Researchers suggest that despite the specimen being the tail of a young dinosaur, it had adult feathers, not juvenile ones.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 昨日の朝、トルコのガジアンテップの警察本部で自動車爆弾の爆発により、警官2人が死亡し、負傷者は20人を超えました。
mt: 2 police officers were killed and more than 20 were injured in a car bomb explosion at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, early yesterday morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: 知事室の報道によれば、負傷者のうち19人は警官でした。
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: 警察は、攻撃に関与した過激派ダーシュ（ISIL）を疑っていると述べました。
mt: Police suspect the attack was carried out by the extremist group Daesh (ISIL).
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: 彼らは、太陽が他の星と同じ基本原理で動いていることを発見しました。星系内にあるすべての星の活動は、その光度と自転によってのみ駆動され、その他の要因はないことがわかりました。
mt: They discovered that the sun moves in the same basic principles as other stars. The activity of all stars within a star system is driven only by their luminosity and rotation, with no other factors.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: 光度と自転の組み合わせから、プラズマ流に関係する星のロスビー数が決定されます。
mt: The Rossby number is determined from the combination of the rotation rate and the luminosity of stars related to plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: ロスビー数が小さいほど磁気反転に関して星の活性が低下するわけです。
mt: The fewer Rossby waves, the lower the activity of the stars in terms of magnetic reversal.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 旅の途中、岩崎さんは何度もトラブルに見舞われました。
mt: During the trip, Iwazaki was plagued by trouble.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: 海賊に襲われたり、チベットで狂犬に襲われたり、ネパールでの結婚から逃れたり、インドで逮捕されたりしたのです。
mt: I was attacked by pirates, bitten by rabid dogs in Tibet, escaped from a wedding in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n規格に準拠していれば、2.4Ghzまたは5.0Ghzのどちらの周波数でも通信可能です。
mt: 802.11n compliant devices can communicate on either the 2.4GHz or 5.0GHz frequency.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: これにより、基地局がデュアルバンド無線を搭載していれば、802.11a、802.11b、802.11gとの下位互換性を確保することができます。
mt: This allows base stations equipped with dual-band radios to maintain compatibility with 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11nの速度は、600Mbit/秒という理論上の最大スループットを持つ従来型の速度よりも大幅に高速です。
mt: 802.11n's speed is much faster than the theoretical maximum of 600Mbit/s of the previous generation.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: 既婚者であり、成人した2人の子を持つデュバルは、この話に関係するミラーにあまり印象を残しませんでした。
mt: Duval, who is married and has two adult children, said he didn't have much of an impression of the man who would later become his brother-in-law.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: コメントを求められたミラー氏は、「公聴会ではマイクがよくしゃべるので、私は準備をしていたので、何を言っているのかよく聞こえなかった」と述べた。
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, "The microphone was very talkative at the hearing, so I was prepared, so I didn't hear what he was saying very well."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: 「我々は、2020年までにGDPあたりの二酸化炭素排出量を2005年の水準から大幅に削減するように努力する」と胡錦濤国家主席は述べました。
mt: "We will make efforts to reduce our carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin by 2020 compared with the 2005 level," President Hu Jintao said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: 胡氏は、削減する数値を定めませんでしたが、削減は中国の経済産出量に基づいて実施されるだろうと述べました。
mt: Hu said the numbers for the cuts were not set, but they would be based on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: 胡錦濤国家主席は、発展途上国に「まず汚染してから後始末をするというこれまでのやり方を避けるように」と呼びかけました。
mt: Hu Jintao, the Chinese president, called for developing countries to avoid the "first pollute, then clean up" approach.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: 「しかし、発展段階、責任、能力を超えた義務を負うことを求められてはならない」と付け加えました。
mt: "However, one should not be asked to take on a responsibility, development stage, and ability beyond the duty," he added.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: イラク研究会は、本日12時GMTに報告書を公開しました。
mt: The Iraq Study Group released its report at noon GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: 警告の内容は、現時点でイラクでどのような行動をとっても、宗派間抗争や暴力の拡大、あるいは混沌への滑落を阻止しうると保証できる者はいないというものでした。
mt: The warning stated that no one could guarantee that any action taken in Iraq would prevent the escalation or collapse of sectarian conflict or violence.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: 報告書の冒頭は、公開討論と中東政策について米国内のコンセンサス形成を嘆願する一節で始まっています。
mt: The report begins with a lament for the formation of consensus within the United States on the subject of public discourse and Middle Eastern policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: 本報告書は、イラクに対する行政府の現在の政策のほぼすべての側面を強く批判し、即時の方向転換を促すものです。
mt: The report strongly criticizes almost every aspect of the government's current policy toward Iraq and urges an immediate change of course.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: 78ある提言うち最初に挙げられているのは、敵対的な介入に対してイラクの国境を確保し、近隣諸国との外交関係を再び確立するために、年内に新たな外交主導権を発揮するべきだというものです。
mt: 78 proposals are listed in order of priority, with the first being to assert new diplomatic leadership by securing Iraq's borders against hostile intervention and reestablishing diplomatic relations with neighboring countries by the end of the year.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: 昨晩、ブエノスアイレスから50キロ（31マイル）離れたラプラタ市内で、現職上院議員であるクリスティーナ・フェルナンデス・デ・キルヒナー女史が大統領選への出馬を宣言しました。
mt: Last night, former Senator Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president from the city of La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: キルヒネル夫人は、アルゼンチン劇場で大統領選に出馬するという意向を表明しました。2005年にブエノスアイレス州の代表団の一員として上院選への出馬を表明したのもこの劇場でした。
mt: Kirchner's wife, Cristina, announced her intention to run for president in Argentina's upcoming election. She also announced her intention to run for the Senate in 2005, as a member of the Buenos Aires Province delegation, from this theater.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: この議論は、ハリケーン・カトリーナの去った後の救済と復興にかかる支出をめぐる論争に端を発していました。一部の財政保守派は、ユーモアを込めてこれを「ブッシュのニューオリンズ政策」と呼んでいます。
mt: This debate was sparked by the controversy over the cost of relief and recovery efforts in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina. Some fiscal conservatives have jokingly referred to this as "Bush's New Orleans policy."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: 復興努力に対するリベラル派からの批判では、ワシントンの内部関係者と思われる人物と復興契約を交わしたことに焦点を当てています。
mt: Liberal criticism of the recovery effort has focused on the fact that the contracts were awarded to an individual with ties to Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: 400万人以上が葬儀に参列しようとローマに向かいました。
mt: 4 million people are expected to attend the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: 参列者の数が多すぎて、全員がサンピエトロ広場での葬儀に参加することは不可能でした。
mt: The number of attendees was too large for everyone to attend the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: ローマの各所には、人々に式典を見てもらおうと、大型テレビ画面がいくつも設置されていました。
mt: Large screens were set up in various parts of Rome to allow people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: イタリア国内の他の多くの都市や世界の他の地域（特にポーランド）で同じように設置がされ、多くの人々が視聴しました。
mt: It was also set up in other Italian cities and other parts of the world (especially Poland) and was watched by many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: 歴史家たちは、過去のFBIの方針が、解決しやすい事件、特に盗難車事件にリソースを集中させ、FBIの成功率を上げることを目的としていると批判しています。
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policy of focusing resources on easy-to-solve cases, particularly car thefts, in order to boost the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: 連邦議会は2005年度から猥褻物取締法への資金提供を開始し、FBIはアダルトポルノに10人の捜査員を投入しなければならないと規定しました。
mt: The federal government began funding enforcement of obscenity laws in 2005, and the FBI is required to assign ten agents to the investigation of adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: ロビン・ウタッパは、11本のフォーと2本のシックスを打って、わずか41球でイニング最高得点となる70ランを記録した。
mt: Robin Uthappa hit 11 fours and 2 sixes in a 70-run innings off just 41 balls.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: 中軸のバッツマン、サチン・テンドルカール、ラホール・ドラヴィッドが連携してうまく試合を運び、100ランを達成しました。
mt: The middle order of batsmen Sachin Tendulkar, Rahul Dravid and VVS Laxman combined to score a century.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: しかし、キャプテンのウィケットを失った後、インドは7つのウィケットを失い、36ランしかできませんでした。
mt: However, after losing captain Wicket, India lost seven wickets and scored only 36 runs.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: ブッシュ米大統領は16日午前、シンガポールに到着し、１週間のアジア歴訪を開始しました。
mt: 16th, President Bush arrived in Singapore and began a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: シンガポールを訪れた彼は、ウォン・カン・セン副首相から出迎えを受け、リー・シェン・ルーン首相と会談で貿易やテロ問題について話し合いました。
mt: He was greeted by Deputy Prime Minister Wan Ka Seng on his visit to Singapore, and held talks with Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong on trade and terrorism.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: 中間選挙で敗北した1週間後、ブッシュはアジアでの貿易拡大について聴衆に語りました。
mt: 1 week after losing the midterm elections, Bush spoke to the audience about expanding trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: スティーブン・ハーパー首相は、NDP党首であるジャック・レイトン氏と火曜日にPMOで25分間会談した後、その2回目の審議を前にして、政府の「クリーンエア法」を精査するすべての党の委員会に送ることに合意しました。
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" to all-party committees for review before the second reading, after meeting NDP leader Jack Layton for 25 minutes at the PMO on Tuesday.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: レイトン氏は首相との会談で保守党の環境法案に対する変更を求め、保守党の環境法案の「徹底的かつ完全な書き直し」を求めました。
mt: Layton asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environmental bill in a meeting with the prime minister, and asked for a "thorough and complete rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environmental bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: 連邦政府がタスマニア州デボンポートのマーシー病院の資金調達を引き継ぐために介入して以来、州政府と一部の連邦議員は、この行為を11月までに招集される連邦選挙の前哨戦での煽り行為だとして批判しています。
mt: Since the federal government intervened to take over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticized this as a pre-election stunt ahead of the federal election in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: しかし、ジョン・ハワード首相は、この法律について、4500万豪ドルの追加資金を投入することで、タスマニア政府から格下げされないように病院施設を守るためだけのものだったと述べている。
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard said the legislation was only to protect hospitals from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, which had committed an additional $450 million in funding.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: 最新速報によれば、海面測定値は津波の発生を示すものでした。パゴパゴとニウエの近くで明らかな津波活動が何回か記録されていました。
mt: The latest reports indicate that the sea level measurements were indicative of a tsunami. There were several clear tsunami events recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: トンガでは大被害や負傷者は報告されていません。しかし、一時的に停電が発生し、トンガ当局は太平洋津波警報センター（PTWC）が発令した津波警報を受信できなかったとのことでした。
mt: There have been no reports of major damage or injuries in Tonga. However, there was a temporary power outage, and the Tongan authorities were unable to receive the tsunami warning issued by the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center (PTWC).
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: ハワイの海岸線沿いか海岸線に近い場所にある14校は、警報が解除されたにもかかわらず、水曜日はずっと閉鎖されたままでした。
mt: 14 schools along or near the coast of Hawaii were closed for the rest of the week, even after the alert was lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: 米国のジョージ・W・ブッシュ大統領は当該発表を歓迎しました。
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: ブッシュ大統領の報道官であるゴードン・ジョンドロー氏は、北朝鮮の公約を「朝鮮半島の検証可能な非核化を達成するという目標に向けた大きな一歩」と表現しました。
mt: White House Press Secretary Gordon Johndroe said the North Korean pledge was "a big step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: 大西洋でハリケーンの季節に命名された10番目の嵐である、亜熱帯性暴風雨ジェリーが、本日大西洋で発生しました。
mt: 10th storm of the Atlantic hurricane season named Jerry, a tropical storm, formed today in the Atlantic.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: 国立ハリケーンセンター (NHC) によれば、現時点でジェリーは上陸の危険性はないとのことです。
mt: According to the National Hurricane Center (NHC), Jerry is not expected to make landfall.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: 米工兵隊は、以前に決壊した堤防が6インチの降水量で再び決壊する可能性があると推定しています。
mt: The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers estimates that the levee that previously broke could break again with six inches of rainfall.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: ハリケーン「カトリーナ」の上陸時に20フィートもの高さがある洪水が確認された第九区では、近くの堤防が水没したため、現在、腰の高さの水の中にあります。
mt: 9th Ward, which was hit by 20-foot-high flooding during Hurricane Katrina's landfall, is now under water up to the waist because a nearby levee has been breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: 水は幅100フィートの範囲にわたって堤防の上にこぼれ落ちています。
mt: 100-foot wide swath of water is spilling over the levee.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: コモンズ管理者のアダム・カーデン氏は、先月ウィキニューズの取材に応じ、削除されたことへの不満を表明しました。
mt: Commons administrator Adam Carden told Wikinews in an interview last month that he was unhappy with the deletion.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: 「彼（ウェールズ）は基本的に最初から嘘をついていました。1つ目は、これが法的な理由によるものであるかのように振る舞ったこと。2つ目は、私たちの話を聞いているふりをして、芸術作品を削除までしたことです。」
mt: "He (Wales) was basically lying from the start. One, acting as if this was for legal reasons. Two, acting as if he was listening to us, and then deleting the artwork."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: このコミュニティの苛立ちが、何百万ものオープンライセンスメディアをホストしているサイトの性的コンテンツに関するポリシーを起草するという現在の努力につながっています。
mt: The frustration of this community has led to the drafting of a policy on sexual content for sites hosting millions of open-licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: 内容はほとんどが理論的なものでしたが、書かれたプログラムは射手座銀河で実施した観測を模擬するものでした。
mt: The content was mostly theoretical, but the program written simulated observations of the Andromeda galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: このチームが求めていた効果は、銀河系の暗黒物質と天の川の暗黒物質の間で働く潮汐力による作用だったのでしょう。
mt: The team was looking for an effect of the tidal force that would work between the dark matter of the Milky Way and the dark matter of the galaxy.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: 月の引力で地球に潮の満ち引きが起きるように、天の川は射手座銀河にも力を及ぼしています。
mt: Like the tides on Earth are caused by the gravitational pull of the Moon, the Milky Way is exerting a force on the Andromeda Galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: 科学者たちは、暗黒物質は、通常の物質と同じように他の暗黒物質にも影響を与えていると結論づけました。
mt: Scientists concluded that dark matter interacts with other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: この理論によると、銀河の周りにある暗黒物質のほとんどは、一種のハローのように銀河を取り巻き、たくさんの小粒子でできていると言われています。
mt: According to this theory, most of the dark matter around the galaxy is in the form of a halo that surrounds the galaxy, made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: テレビの報道によると、原発から白煙が上がっています。
mt: Television reports smoke rising from the plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: 自治体は、原発周辺の住民に屋外に出ないように警告し、エアコンを切り、水道水を飲まないように警告しています。
mt: The municipality is warning residents near the plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners, and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: 日本の原子力庁によれば、原発内で放射性セシウムとヨウ素が特定されています。
mt: According to Japan's Nuclear Safety Commission, radioactive cesium and iodine have been identified inside the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: 当局の推定では、これはウラン燃料が入っていたコンテナが破裂し、燃料が漏れている可能性を示しています。
mt: Officials estimate the leak may be from a container of uranium fuel that ruptured.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: トニー・モール博士は、南アフリカのクワズールー・ナタール地方で、極度薬剤耐性結核（XDR-TB）を発見しました。
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extreme drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the Kwazulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: インタビューで彼は新しい変異体について「極めて致死率が高い厄介なものであり、憂慮すべきものである」と述べました。
mt: In an interview, he described the new variant as "very nasty and very dangerous" and "a big concern."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: モル博士は、何人かの患者が病院内で感染したのではないかと推測し、少なくとも2人は病院の医療従事者であったと考えています。
mt: Dr. Mor suspects that some patients may have been infected within the hospital, and at least two were hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
